TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CustomReflectionContext extends System.Reflection.ReflectionContext
Public MustInherit Class CustomReflectionContext Inherits ReflectionContext
public ref class CustomReflectionContext abstract : System::Reflection::ReflectionContext

summary.span: 表示自定义的反射上下文。

span.span: Represents a customizable reflection context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供有关你可以添加或移除反射对象的自定义特性或将 dummy 属性添加到这些对象，而无需重新实现完整反射模型的方法。 provides a way for you to add or remove custom attributes from reflection objects, or add dummy properties to those objects, without re-implementing the complete reflection model. 默认值只需包装反射对象而不进行任何更改，但通过子类化，而重写相关方法，可以添加、 删除或更改的特性应用于任何反射的参数或成员，或添加新属性反射的类型。The default simply wraps reflection objects without making any changes, but by subclassing and overriding the relevant methods, you can add, remove, or change the attributes that apply to any reflected parameter or member, or add new properties to a reflected type. 例如，假设你的代码，如下所示的约定将特定属性应用于工厂方法，但现在需要缺少属性的第三方代码的使用。For example, suppose that your code follows the convention of applying a particular attribute to factory methods, but you are now required to work with third-party code that lacks attributes. 你可以使用若要指定用于标识应具有属性的对象的规则，以便在从你的代码中查看时提供具有这些属性的对象。You can use to specify a rule for identifying the objects that should have attributes and to supply the objects with those attributes when they are viewed from your code. 若要使用实际上，使用反射的对象的代码，必须支持指定的反射上下文，而不是假定所有反映对象将与运行时反射上下文相关联的概念。To use effectively, the code that uses the reflected objects must support the notion of specifying a reflection context, instead of assuming that all reflected objects are associated with the runtime reflection context. .NET Framework 中的许多反射方法提供为此目的的参数。Many reflection methods in the .NET Framework provide a parameter for this purpose. 若要修改应用于反射的参数或成员的属性，重写或方法。To modify the attributes that are applied to a reflected parameter or member, override the or method. 这些方法采用反映的对象和属性在其当前的反射上下文下的列表，并返回它应具有自定义反射上下文中的属性的列表。These methods take the reflected object and the list of attributes under its current reflection context, and return the list of attributes it should have under the custom reflection context. > [!WARNING] > 方法不应直接通过调用访问的反射的对象或方法的特性列表所提供的方法或实例，但应改用`declaredAttributes`列表，作为参数传递到方法重载。 methods should not access the list of attributes of a reflected object or method directly by calling the method on the provided or instance, but should instead use the `declaredAttributes` list, which is passed as a parameter to the method overloads. 若要将属性添加到反射的类型，重写方法。To add properties to a reflected type, override the method. 该方法接受一个参数，指定反射的类型，并返回的其他属性的列表。The method accepts a parameter that specifies the reflected type, and returns a list of additional properties. 应使用方法来创建要返回的属性对象。You should use the method to create property objects to return. 在创建该属性将充当属性访问器，并可以省略某个访问器，若要创建只读或只写属性时，你可以指定委托。You can specify delegates when creating the property that will serve as the property accessor, and you can omit one of the accessors to create a read-only or write-only property. 请注意，此类虚拟属性具有任何元数据或公共中间语言 (CIL) 备份。Note that such dummy properties have no metadata or Common Intermediate Language (CIL) backing. > [!WARNING] > 时务必小心有关反射对象之间的相等性使用反射上下文，因为对象可能表示多个上下文中的相同反射的对象。Be cautious about equality among reflected objects when you work with reflection contexts, because objects may represent the same reflected object in multiple contexts. 你可以使用方法来获取特定的反射上下文的版本的反射对象。You can use the method to obtain a particular reflection context's version of a reflected object. > [!WARNING] > A对象将返回一个特定的反射对象，如通过所获得的属性更改方法。A object alters the attributes returned by a particular reflection object, such as those obtained by the method. 它不会更改返回的自定义属性数据方法，并且这两个列表将不匹配时使用的自定义反射上下文。It does not alter the custom attribute data returned by the method, and these two lists will not match when you use a custom reflection context. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建子类将自定义属性添加到其名称必须以"到"开头的给定类型的所有成员。The following example demonstrates how to subclass to add a custom attribute to all the members of a given type whose names begin with "To". 若要运行此代码，将其粘贴到一个空白控制台项目，并确保包含对 System.Reflection.Context.dll 的引用。To run this code, paste it into an empty console project, and make sure to include a reference to System.Reflection.Context.dll. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.context.customreflectioncontext/cs/program.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以指定哪些属性应添加到给定的类型。Override this method to specify which properties should be added to a given type. 若要创建属性，使用方法。To create the properties, use the method.

span.span: Creates an object that represents a property to be added to a type, as specified by the method.
